text: David Lindon Lammy (born 19 July 1972) is a British Labour Party politician, who is currently serving as the Foreign Secretary since 2024. He has been the Member of Parliament (MP) for Tottenham since 2000. He was the Shadow Secretary of State for Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Affairs from 2021 until 2024. ==References== Category:1972 births Category:Living people Category:Politicians from London Category:Labour Party (UK) MPs Category:UK MPs 1997–2001 Category:UK MPs 2001–2005 Category:UK MPs 2005–2010 Category:UK MPs 2010–2015 Category:UK MPs 2015–2017 Category:UK MPs 2017–2019 Category:UK MPs 2019–2024 Category:Black British people Category:UK MPs 2024–present
title: David Lammy
